price: If We had wished for a pastime[9], We could have had it from Our own, if We were to do so.
arabic: لَوۡ أَرَدۡنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ لَهۡوٗا لَّٱتَّخَذۡنَٰهُ مِن لَّدُنَّآ إِن كُنَّا فَٰعِلِينَ
footnotes: [9] Such as a wife or a child.
